code: import"antd/es/message/style/css";import _message from"antd/es/message";import axios from"axios";export default function ajax(url){var data=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var type=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"GET";var promise;return new Promise(function(resolve,reject){if(type==="GET"){promise=axios.get(url,{params:data});}else{promise=axios.post(url,data);}promise.then(function(response){resolve(response);}).catch(function(error){_message.error("请求出错了");});});}
